title: Cameras show tornado ripping through Texas town
description: The CCTV footage reveals the moment a tornado touched down and tore through Deer Creek.
content:
With wind speeds reaching 140mph (225km/h), a tornado wreaked havoc across the Houston area. 
CCTV cameras in Deer Creek, Texas, caught some of the destruction.
